<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Defenders Tas Cloud Controller Address</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v33.00/defenders/tas-cloud-controller-address"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"manageDefenders"}
```



Returns the cloud controller addresses for Tas defenders.
